query:
SELECT 
  CASE WHEN ft_count = 0 THEN 'No files' ELSE 'Has files' END as status,
  COUNT(*) as tag_count,
  GROUP_CONCAT(name SEPARATOR ', ') as sample_tags
FROM (
  SELECT t.id, t.name, COUNT(DISTINCT ft.fileId) as ft_count
  FROM tags t
  LEFT JOIN fileTags ft ON t.id = ft.tagId
  GROUP BY t.id, t.name
  LIMIT 50
) sub
GROUP BY status;

  CASE WHEN ft_count = 0 THEN 'No files' ELSE 'Has files' END as status,
  COUNT(*) as tag_count,
  GROUP_CONCAT(name SEPARATOR ', ') as sample_tags
FROM (
  SELECT t.id, t.name, COUNT(DISTINCT ft.fileId) as ft_count
  FROM tags t
  LEFT JOIN fileTags ft ON t.id = ft.tagId
  GROUP BY t.id, t.name
  LIMIT 50
) sub
GROUP BY status;
